languages.text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gains 30% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. On its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature is reanimated with 50% of its wounds if it still has temporary wounds. If the creature has no other allies with base wounds more than 0, this creature and its allies die. ! Can only be used once per battle.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} существа падает до 0, до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оно становится {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинутым{/g} и получает 30% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Если к началу своего следующего хода у существа остается временное здоровье, это существо поднимается, получая 50% от максимального здоровья. Если все остальные союзники существа на поле боя обладают только временным здоровьем, это существо и его союзники погибают. ! Может использоваться только один раз за бой.

traits.locale_text: When this creature's wounds drop to 0, it falls prone and gains 30% of its maximum wounds as temporary wounds. On its next turn, the creature is reanimated with 50% of its wounds if it still has temporary wounds. If the creature has no other allies with base wounds more than 0, this creature and its allies die. ! Can only be used once per battle.

When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gains 30% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. On its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature is reanimated with 50% of its wounds if it still has temporary wounds. If the creature has no other allies with base wounds more than 0, this creature and its allies die. ! Can only be used once per battle.

When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gains 30% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. On its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature is reanimated with 50% of its wounds if it still has temporary wounds. If the creature has no other allies with base wounds more than 0, this creature and its allies die. ! Can only be used once per battle.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} существа падает до 0, до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оно становится {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинутым{/g} и получает 30% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Если к началу своего следующего хода у существа остается временное здоровье, это существо поднимается, получая 50% от максимального здоровья. Если все остальные союзники существа на поле боя обладают только временным здоровьем, это существо и его союзники погибают. ! Может использоваться только один раз за бой.

Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan a 0, cae {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribada{/g} y obtiene un 30 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. En su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, si la criatura aún tiene heridas temporales, se reanima con un 50 % de sus heridas. Si la criatura no tiene aliados con heridas básicas por encima de 0, tanto la criatura como sus aliados mueren. ! Solo funciona una vez por batalla.
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gains 30% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. On its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature is reanimated with 50% of its wounds if it still has temporary wounds. If the creature has no other allies with base wounds more than 0, this creature and its allies die. ! Can only be used once per battle.

traits.locale_text: Cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan a 0, cae {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribada{/g} y obtiene un 30 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. En su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, si la criatura aún tiene heridas temporales, se reanima con un 50 % de sus heridas. Si la criatura no tiene aliados con heridas básicas por encima de 0, tanto la criatura como sus aliados mueren. ! Solo funciona una vez por batalla.

languages.text: 当此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0时，会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，同时获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的30%。下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，如果此生物依然拥有临时生命值，则会以50%最大生命值复活。 如果此生物所有盟友的基础生命值都降至0或以下，则此生物与所有盟友均会死亡。 ！此效果每场战斗只能触发一次。
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gains 30% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. On its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature is reanimated with 50% of its wounds if it still has temporary wounds. If the creature has no other allies with base wounds more than 0, this creature and its allies die. ! Can only be used once per battle.

traits.locale_text: 当该生物的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}降为0时，会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，同时获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的30%。下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，如果此生物依然拥有临时生命值，则会以50%最大生命值复活。 如果该生物所有盟友的基础生命值都降至0或以下，则该生物与所有盟友均会死亡。 ！此效果每场战斗只能触发一次。

languages.text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur auf 0 sinken, wird sie {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} und erhält 30 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} wird die Kreatur mit 50 % wiederbelebt, falls sie noch temporäre Wunden hat. Hat die Kreatur keine anderen Verbündeten mit einem höheren Grund-Wundenwert als 0, sterben die Kreatur und ihre Verbündeten. ! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gains 30% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. On its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature is reanimated with 50% of its wounds if it still has temporary wounds. If the creature has no other allies with base wounds more than 0, this creature and its allies die. ! Can only be used once per battle.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur auf 0 fallen, wird sie {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} und erhält 30 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} wird die Kreatur mit 50 % wiederbelebt, falls sie noch temporäre Wunden hat. Wenn die Kreatur keine anderen Verbündeten mit einem höheren Grund-Wundenwert als 0 hat, sterben die Kreatur und ihre Verbündeten. ! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: Lorsque la {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}réserve de blessures{/g} de cette créature tombe à 0, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et reçoit un bonus de 30 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}. Lors de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la créature est réanimée à hauteur de 50 % de ses blessures si elle présente encore des blessures temporaires. Si la créature n'a pas d'autres alliés présentant des blessures de base supérieures à 0, cette créature et ses alliés meurent. ! Utilisable une fois par combat.
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gains 30% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. On its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature is reanimated with 50% of its wounds if it still has temporary wounds. If the creature has no other allies with base wounds more than 0, this creature and its allies die. ! Can only be used once per battle.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque la {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}réserve de blessures{/g} de cette créature tombe à 0, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysée{/g} et reçoit un bonus de 30 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}. Lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant, la créature est réanimée à hauteur de 50 % de ses blessures si elle présente encore des blessures temporaires. Si la créature n'a pas d'autres alliés présentant des blessures de base supérieures à 0, cette créature et ses alliés meurent. ! Utilisable une fois par combat.

languages.text: この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が0になった時、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態となり、その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の30%を{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}として得る。次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}、この生物は50%の体力（一時体力のまま）で蘇生する。 この生物以外に基本体力が0より多い味方がいない場合、この生物とその味方は死亡する。 ！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
languages.original_text: When this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gains 30% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. On its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the creature is reanimated with 50% of its wounds if it still has temporary wounds. If the creature has no other allies with base wounds more than 0, this creature and its allies die. ! Can only be used once per battle.

traits.locale_text: この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が0になった時、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態となり、その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の30%を{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}として得る。次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}、この生物は50%の体力（一時体力のまま）で蘇生する。 この生物以外に基本体力が0より多い味方がいない場合、この生物とその味方は死亡する。 ！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
